page.title: 15Plains Farm Estate
page.content: { Plains Farm Estate}was built in 1938_1939. A temporary school, locally known as{'The Huts',}was erected in 1940. This stood until 1977 when new buildings were erected. The old school in the forties housed many activities. Among these were the local community centre and boys club. The Catholic Church also held Sunday services in the school and even today{no church}of any denomination exists on the estate. For such a large estate facilities such as shops etc. are very poor. It was not until 1978 that a house in the middle of the estate was converted into a general dealers, saving some residents a long walk. In 1967 a{working man's club}was built on a site near the end of Premier Road and has become an integral part of the community.
